event.title: JAPAN vs IRELAND Rugby LIVE TOKYO @ TAKETORA Shinjuku Sports Bar * All-You-Can-Drink * 1000YenOFF
event.description:
Watch JAPAN vs IRELAND LIVE at the Rugby World Cup 2019 Public Viewing Tokyo at Sports Bar TAKETORA Shinjuku.
Enjoy All-You-Can-Drink, cheer for the BRAVE BLOSSOMS and watch Japan’s National Team’s win on our big screens together with lots of crazy rugby fans!!!

Only 1000 YEN with reservation at:
9/28 JAPAN vs IRELAND @ TAKETORA Shinjuku http://www.tokyoparty.org/partys.php?lang=en&p=japan_ireland -
10/5 JAPAN vs SAMOA @ LAUREL TOKYO Shibuya http://www.tokyoparty.org/partys.php?lang=en&p=japan_samoa -
10/13 JAPAN vs SCOTLAND @ LAUREL TOKYO Shibuya http://www.tokyoparty.org/partys.php?lang=en&p=japan_scotland -

- Join lots of rugby fans at Tokyo’s #1 Public Viewing Party!!!
- Feel the stadium atmosphere together with your friends ;-)
- All-You-Can-Drink Juice, Cocktails, Beer, Softdrinks etc.
- JAPAN vs IRELAND @ Rugby World Cup JAPAN 2019™
- Watch the world’s best rugby players on our big screens
- Get the magic All-You-Can-Drink wristband for only 1000 Yen extra!!!
- Make new friends and have a great time at a cool sports bar.
- Simply Tokyo’s best Rugby Party for years…

  • Rugby World Cup JAPAN 2019™ Public Viewing Tokyo *
  • Brave Blossoms LIVE @ TAKETORA Shinjuku * All-You-Can-Drink * 1000 Yen *
    Map: https://goo.gl/maps/88z9gEgBcUeyMEuR9
    Address: WaMall Kabukicho 11F,[masked] Kabukicho, Shinjuku-ku, Tokyo
    Details:
    9/28 JAPAN vs IRELAND http://www.tokyoparty.org/partys.php?lang=en&p=japan_ireland -
    Kickoff: 16:15 (Japanese Time)
  • Brave Blossoms LIVE @ LAUREL TOKYO Shibuya * All-You-Can-Drink * 1000 Yen *
    Map: https://goo.gl/maps/DnEzoTkwUAz
    Address: SK PLAZA Bldg. B1F,[masked] Dogenzaka, Shibuya-ku, Tokyo
    Details:
    10/5 JAPAN vs SAMOA http://www.tokyoparty.org/partys.php?lang=en&p=japan_samoa -
    Kickoff: 19:30 (Japanese Time)
    10/13 JAPAN vs SCOTLAND http://www.tokyoparty.org/partys.php?lang=en&p=japan_scotland -
    Kickoff: 19:45 (Japanese Time)
    …TBA…

Everybody is welcome, so tell your friends and join us.
